templates.value:
Career Overview: 

[[Demographics]] [[ActingSummary]] [[AwardsSummary]] [[CareerSummary]]

Decade Highlights: [[reference]] acted most movies in [[RefHisHer]] career in decade [[YearFormat(global.BestMovieDecade)]]

[[reference]] is a [[WholeJSON.nationality]] [[if(WholeJSON.gender=='male'){actor}else{actress}]] who was born in [[formatNumber(WholeJSON.birthyear,'####')]][[if (WholeJSON.diedyear!=null){ and died in [[formatNumber(WholeJSON.diedyear,'####')]]}]].

[[global.ReferenceCount=ReferenceCount+1;

if (ReferenceCount==1){[[WholeJSON.name]]}elseif(ReferenceCount%3==0){[[WholeJSON.shortname]]}else{[[pronoun(WholeJSON.gender)]]}]]

[[// generate summary of awards.  Example: Blanchett won one Academy Award for Best Actress and one Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress.
awards = filter((AwardPhrase('Best Actor'),AwardPhrase('Best Actress'),AwardPhrase('Best Supporting Actor'),AwardPhrase('Best Supporting Actress')),x->len(x)>15);

if (len(awards)>0){[[reference]] won [[list('','','',awards)]].}]]

#define AwardPhrase(awardtype)[[
AwardCount = len(filter(ActorMovies,movie->movie.award==awardtype));
if (AwardCount > 0){[[countable(AwardCount,'Academy','Award')]] for [[awardtype]]}
]]
[[if(len(ActorMovies)>0){[[reference]] [[chooseAtRandom('acted','appeared')]] in [[countable(len(ActorMovies),'','movie')]][[notableMovies]].}else{[[reference]] did not act in any movies.}]]

[[notableMovies = filter(ActorMovies, movie-> (movie.award != null || (movie.rating != null && movie.rating >= 8)));

if (len(notableMovies)>0){, including [[sortStrings(map(notableMovies,movie->movie.name))]]}

]]

#define DecadeSummary(decadeStart)

Decade : [[global.count = count+1]]

[[if(count==1){

[[global.BestMovieDecade=decadeStart;""]]

[[global.BestAwardDecade=decadeStart;""]]

[[global.DecadeStartYear=decadeStart;""]]

[[WholeJSON.shortname]] started  [[RefHisHer]] career in [[YearFormat(decadeStart)]],s. [[reference]] appeared in [[countable(global.MovieNum3=MovieCount(DecadeMovies(decadeStart)),'','movie','','no')]] in that Decade and won [[countable(global.AwardDecade3=MovieCount(DecadeAward(decadeStart)),'','award','','no')]].[[WholeJSON.name]] directed [[countable(MovieCount(DecadeDirect(decadeStart)),'','movies','','no')]] in the [[YearFormat(decadeStart)]]s and produced [[countable(MovieCount(DecadeProduce(decadeStart)),'','movies','','no')]]}

elseif(count==2){

[[WholeJSON.shortname]] appeared in [[countable(global.MovieNum1=MovieCount(DecadeMovies(decadeStart)),'','movie','','no')]] in that Decade and won [[countable(global.AwardDecade1=MovieCount(DecadeAward(decadeStart)),'','award','','no')]].[[WholeJSON.name]] directed [[countable(MovieCount(DecadeDirect(decadeStart)),'','movies','','no')]] in the [[YearFormat(decadeStart)]]s and produced [[countable(MovieCount(DecadeProduce(decadeStart)),'','movies','','no')]]

[[if(global.MovieNum3<global.MovieNum1){

[[global.BestMovieDecade=decadeStart;""]]

}]]

[[if(global.AwardDecade3<global.AwardDecade3){

[[global.BestMDecade=decadeStart;""]]

}]]

[[if(MovieNum3<global.MovieNum1){[[RefHisHer]] second decade was better than the first decade im terms of movie numbers}

else{[[RefHisHer]] second decade was worse than the first decade in terms of movie numbers}]] and [[if(AwardDecade3<global.AwardDecade1){in terms of Award winning this decade was better than the first decade }

elseif(AwardDecade3==global.AwardDecade1){similiar in terms of Award winning }

else{this decade was worse than the first decade in terms of award winning}]].}

else{

[[global.MovieNum2=global.MovieNum1;""]]

[[global.MovieNum4=global.MovieNum2;""]]

[[global.AwardDecade2=global.AwardDecade1;""]]

[[global.AwardDecade4=global.AwardDecade2;""]]

[[WholeJSON.shortname]] appeared in [[countable(global.MovieNum2=global.MovieNum1=MovieCount(DecadeMovies(decadeStart)),'','movie','','no')]] in the [[YearFormat(decadeStart)]],s and won [[countable(global.AwardDecade1=MovieCount(DecadeAward(decadeStart)),'','award','','no')]].

[[WholeJSON.name]] directed [[countable(global.DirectDecade1=MovieCount(DecadeDirect(decadeStart)),'','movie','','no')]] in the [[YearFormat(decadeStart)]]s and produced [[countable(MovieCount(DecadeProduce(decadeStart)),'','movie','','no')]].

[[if(global.MovieNum2<global.MovieNum1){[[RefHisHer]] this decade was better than the last decade im terms of movie numbers }

else{[[RefHisHer]] this decade was worse than the last decade in terms of movie numbers}]] and [[if(global.AwardDecade2<global.AwardDecade1){in terms of Award winning this decade was better than the last decade}

elseif(global.AwardDecade2==global.AwardDecade1){similiar in terms of Award winning}

else{in terms of Award winning this decade was worse than the last decade}]]. [[if(global.MovieNum1<global.DirectDecade1){Its noticeable that in this decade [[RefHisHer]] career direction changed and [[reference]] was focusing on directing more movies}]].

[[if(global.MovieNum4<global.MovieNum1 && global.MovieNum4>global.MovieNum3){[[global.BestMovieDecade=decadeStart;""]]}]]

}]]

#define MovieCount(movieList)[[// return the number of movies in a list of movies
len(movieList)]]

#define YearFormat(year)[[// return a year in usual format
formatNumber(year,'####')]]

#define AwardCount(movieList)[[// return the number of Acting Academy awards in a movie list
BestActorAwardCount = len(filter(movieList,movie->movie.award=='Best Actor'));
BestActressAwardCount = len(filter(movieList,movie->movie.award=='Best Actress'));
BestSupportingActorAwardCount = len(filter(movieList,movie->movie.award=='Best Supporting Actor'));
BestSupportingActressAwardCount = len(filter(movieList,movie->movie.award=='Best Supporting Actress'));
BestActorAwardCount+BestActressAwardCount+BestSupportingActorAwardCount+BestSupportingActressAwardCount
]]

#define DecadeMovies(decadeStart)[[// return list of movies that an actor was in during a decade
filter(ActorMovies,movie->(movie.year!=null&&movie.year>=decadeStart&&movie.year<decadeStart+10))
]]

[[yearList = filter(map(ActorMovies,movie->movie.year),movie->movie!=null);
decadeList = filter((1890,1900,1910,1920,1930,1940,1950,1960,1970,1980,1990,2000,2010),decade->(decade>=minVal(yearList)&&decade<=maxVal(yearList)));
forAll(decadeList,DecadeSummary);
]]
[[if(WholeJSON.gender=='male'){his}else{her}]]

#define DecadeAward(decadeStart)[[// return list of movies that an actor was in during a decade
filter(ActorMovies,movie->(movie.award!=null && movie.year!=null &&movie.year>=decadeStart&&movie.year<decadeStart+10))
]]

#define DecadeDirect(decadeStart)[[// return list of movies that an actor was in during a decade
filter(DirectMovies,movie->(movie.role=='director'&& movie.year!=null && movie.year >=decadeStart&&movie.year<decadeStart+10))
]]

#define DirectCount(directList)[[// return the number of movies in a list of movies
len(directList)]]

#define BestDecades(decadeStart)[[// return list of movies that an actor was in during a decade
filter(DirectMovies,movie->(movie.role=='director'&&movie.year>=decadeStart&&movie.year<decadeStart+10))
]]

#define ProduceCount(produceList)[[// return the number of movies in a list of movies
len(produceList)]]

#define DecadeProduce(decadeStart)[[// return list of movies that an actor was in during a decade
filter(ProduceMovies,movie->(movie.role=='producer'&& movie.year!=null && movie.year >=decadeStart&&movie.year<decadeStart+10))
]]
[[if(WholeJSON.gender=='male'){he}else{she}]]
